review: This is a modern dental clinic. The staff is friendly and so is the Doctor. I would strongly recommend this clinic tomy friends. I can only wish if the cost of treatment were little more affordable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very easeful and supportive . Felt no pain at all and welcomed. Loved the seamlesssness and without judgment supportive environment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Professionally the most competent and by nature very humble doctor. My upper second molar was declared for extraction by one dentist  for possible fracture and another dentist was not able to identify the root cause of repeated infection relapse.  It is then that I rushed to Dr Bajaj bypassing the advice of 02 dentists as a last attempt who immediately got CT scan done, identified the infection  in the hidden  root and treated it as per rct procedure. Thus , I could save my molar from extraction.
Thank you so much  ,Dr Bajaj . I wish you good health and may you continue treating other patients with same passion , competence and dedication. This is the 3rd time you have  reimposed my trust in your competence. Let me put on record that  your nature , temperament and assurance to patients with a smile is the most desirable quality  a patient seaks in his/ her doctor and you are blessed to have that. Pse maintain it the same way. Thanks a ton once again and g
ood luck. Regards

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: All in all excellent. Staff, Dr , Treatment. Time schedule and follow from clinic. I shall recommend all to this place for dental treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: A thorough professional with Very gentle hands. I didn't even come to know when she removed the stitches.

review: *** **** ***** ** *** ****** ********* ****. Have been coming here since I was a child and have never had a problem. Had done my root canal here. No pain and all done in one sitting. Had my cavity filling done here and cleaning also. Amazing place and friendly doctors. Treat you with patience and a smile

tags: None
review: Dr Nishi and Dr Ajay are very professional and have an excellent attitude towards their patients. I live in Singapore and most of my family members are living overseas outside India. We visit Smilez Unlimited Dental Clinic atleast twice in a year and are very satisfied with the timely dental treatment which is of a very superior quality and within reasonable expenditure. We wish Dr Nishi and Dr Ajay Bajaj good luck for the future. They have set an example for future generations of dentists that will pass out from the esteemed Indian universities in the years to come.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr Bajaj clinic is a place where you get complete care of Dental. Dr Ajay and Dr Nishi are super in their profession. I who was always finding stressed to go to dental doctors is now completely relieved and comfortable to go to dentists. These guys are master in the subject and provide well required diagnostic measures. A team full of professional along with the super cooperative staff. God bless the team and the doctors. Keep shining

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
